name: jssm-viz-demo
description: Show how to use jssm-viz in a project, to render a jssm machine

scripts.cloneace: cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/ace.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/ext-*.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/mode-fsl.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/mode-javascript.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/mode-svg.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/mode-dot.js ./docs && cp ./node_modules/ace-builds/src-noconflict/theme-*.js ./docs
scripts.clone: npm run clonejs && npm run clonehtml && npm run cloneace
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run clone

author: John Haugeland <stonecypher@gmail.com>
